description.chunk1: Delish Thai is a small, independent Thai minimarket and takeaway in the heart of Veenendaal, founded by us — Sawi and Gerard — partners in both life and work. Driven by a shared dream to start something of our own, we set out to create a place that’s personal, warm, and just a little different.
description.chunk2: We share a love for Thai food and a desire to offer something real: comforting, everyday flavors made with care. From essential Thai ingredients like rice, curry paste, and coconut milk to ready-to-cook meal kits and home-style takeaway, everything we offer is rooted in authenticity and crafted with intention.
description.chunk3: Sawi grew up in Thailand, learning to cook from her family, guided by tradition and instinct. With a background in chemical engineering, she loves experimenting and fine-tuning recipes to bring out the best in every dish. Gerard discovered his appreciation for Thai cuisine during our travels, drawn to its bold flavors and the warmth of Thai hospitality. That same welcoming spirit shapes how we run our shop.
description.chunk4: We simply believe in good food, kind people, and creating a space that feels like home. We’re proud to be part of Veenendaal, and we hope our shop becomes a place where you feel welcome, inspired — and always leave with something delicious.

items.title: Featured by Winkelstad Veenendaal
items.description: Thank you to Raoni van de Pol (Marketing & PR Coordinator) for visiting, writing our story, and taking the photos. The article highlights our Thai street-food takeaway, fan-favorites like Massaman and Pad Kra Pao, your choice of protein, and our plan to add dishes from Sawi’s Isaan roots plus seasonal specials. It also previews our mini-market with Thai essentials.

items.title: Local feature: A taste of Thailand in Veenendaal
items.description: Indebuurt Veenendaal interviewed Sawi & Gerard about our Thai street-food corner, the upcoming minimarket, and why we chose this lively town center. Special thanks to Fleur Hensen for the lovely write-up and photos.

description.chunk1: At Delish Thai, our street food corner is all about warmth, comfort, and the joy of sharing real Thai flavors. Whether you're looking for a quick bite or a cozy place to pause your day, you're always welcome here. Our dishes are freshly prepared with care — just like back home in Thailand — and served in a friendly setting that feels relaxed and down to earth.
description.chunk2: Here’s what you’ll find on our menu:
description.chunk3: • Classic Thai street food favorites – Pad Thai, Khao Pad (fried rice), and Curries, made the traditional way with love and balance.
description.chunk4: • Tasty snacks – Crispy spring rolls, grilled satay with creamy peanut sauce, and other small bites packed with flavor.
description.chunk5: • Refreshing Thai drinks – Like Thai iced tea, lemongrass infusions, and tropical fruit juices to cool you down and lift you up.
description.chunk6: A cozy seating corner — A small but welcoming space to enjoy your meal at your own pace. We've created this little corner of Thailand with heart, and whether you're trying Thai food for the first time or it's already part of who you are, we hope you feel at home here — and that every visit leaves you with a smile and something delicious to remember.

dishes.title: M1. Pad Kra Pao (Thai Basil Stir-Fry)
dishes.description: Fiery stir-fry of minced chicken/sliced beef, garlic and plenty of holy basil — savory, aromatic.

moreDescription.chunk1: A classic Thai street-food dish: minced chicken/sliced beef wok-tossed with garlic, fresh bird’s eye chillies, and loads of holy (kra pao) basil, seasoned with fish sauce, oyster sauce and a touch of soy. Intensely aromatic, savoury and slightly spicy — served with steamed jasmine rice.
moreDescription.chunk2: Contains: fish (fish sauce), soy, molluscs (oyster sauce), gluten (in soy/oyster sauces)

dishes.title: M2. Khao Pad Sapparot (Pineapple Fried Rice)
dishes.description: Sweet pineapple, raisins, cashews & egg fried rice with a hint of curry.

moreDescription.chunk1: A colorful Thai favorite where jasmine rice is fried with egg, pineapple chunks, onion, carrot, bell pepper, raisins, spring onion and cashew nuts. Flavored with curry powder, soy sauce and oyster sauce for a fragrant tropical twist.
moreDescription.chunk2: Contains: egg, tree nuts (cashew), soy, molluscs (oyster)

dishes.title: M3. Massaman
dishes.description: Rich, aromatic curry with potato, onion & peanuts.

moreDescription.chunk1: A mild, fragrant curry with tender potatoes, onion, peanuts and a creamy coconut milk base. Flavored with Massaman curry paste, palm sugar and a hint of tamarind for a deep, nutty taste — served with steamed jasmine rice.

dishes.title: M4. Pad Thai
dishes.description: Thailand’s iconic wok-fried noodle dish with egg, peanuts, bean sprouts & our tangy-sweet tamarind sauce.

moreDescription.chunk1: The true taste of Thailand’s streets! Our wok-tossed rice noodles are stir-fried with egg, crunchy peanuts, fresh bean sprouts, spring onion and a perfectly balanced sauce of tamarind, palm sugar and fish sauce.

dishes.title: M5. Pad Med Mamuang (Cashew Nut Stir-Fry)
dishes.description: Crunchy cashews with colorful veggies in a sweet-savory Thai sauce.

moreDescription.chunk1: A vibrant mix of onion, bell pepper, carrot and garlic wok-tossed with crunchy cashew nuts. The sauce is a flavorful balance of soy, oyster, tamarind and a touch of chili jam. Served with jasmine rice for a perfect bite.
moreDescription.chunk2: Contains: tree nuts (cashew), soy, molluscs (oyster), fish

dishes.title: M6. Khao Pad (Fried Rice)
dishes.description: Jasmine rice wok-fried with egg, vegetables & our savory soy blend.

moreDescription.chunk1: Fluffy jasmine rice stir-fried with egg, garlic, onion, carrot, bell pepper and corn. Lightly seasoned with our savory soy blend for a satisfying, homestyle taste.

dishes.title: M7. Pad Phak Ruam Mitr (Mixed Vegetables Stir-Fry)
dishes.description: A rainbow of crisp seasonal veggies in a mild garlic-soy sauce.

moreDescription.chunk1: Fresh, colorful vegetables stir-fried over high heat with garlic and a savory soy–oyster sauce. A light and wholesome choice that still delivers big wok flavor — served with steamed jasmine rice.

dishes.title: M8. Pad See Ew
dishes.description: Smoky Thai stir-fry with wide rice noodles, egg & broccoli in a rich soy sauce blend.

moreDescription.chunk1: A Thai street classic with bold, comforting flavors. Wide rice noodles are wok-seared over high heat for a delicious smoky aroma, then tossed with egg, crisp broccoli, and carrot in a savory soy and oyster sauce mix. Simple, hearty, and full of flavor!

dishes.title: M9. Phat Nuea Nam Man Hoi
dishes.description: Tender sliced beef stir-fried with onion and red chilli in our special oyster sauce.

moreDescription.chunk1: A Thai favorite with tender beef slices, caramelized onion, and fresh red chilli. Wok-fried quickly over high heat and finished in our signature oyster sauce for a rich, savory taste.

dishes.title: S1. Thai Spring rolls
dishes.description: Goudbruin krokante loempia’s gevuld met kool, wortel, glasnoedels en maïs – geserveerd met Thaise sweet-chili dip.

moreDescription.chunk1: Onze Thaise lumpia’s zijn gevuld met een smaakvolle mix van kool, wortel, glasnoedels, maïs en knoflook, op smaak gebracht met oestersaus, witte peper en een vleugje suiker. Gewikkeld in loempiavel (bevat ei), gefrituurd tot perfect krokant en geserveerd met een sweet-chili dip.

dishes.title: S2. Chicken Satay
dishes.description: Sappige gegrilde kippenspiesen met romige Thaise pindasaus.
dishes.recommendation: Perfect om te delen of als voorgerecht.

moreDescription.chunk1: Een Thaise streetfoodfavoriet! Mals gemarineerde kip, gegrild tot perfectie en geserveerd met een volle, romige pindasaus.

description.chunk1: Our mini market specializes in authentic Thai ingredients and delicacies, carefully selected to ensure high quality and the true taste of Thailand. Whether you're cooking at home or simply craving familiar flavors, you'll find a curated selection that brings the heart of Thai cuisine closer to home.
description.chunk2: You’ll find essentials like fresh Thai basil, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, lemongrass, and chili peppers — the soul of many beloved Thai dishes, offered fresh and full of flavor.
description.chunk3: We also carry a wide range of authentic sauces and curry pastes — including red, green, and massaman curry — plus fish sauce, oyster sauce, tamarind paste, and other core ingredients.
description.chunk4: To go along with your groceries, we offer a selection of drinks and teas straight from Thailand — perfect for refreshing moments or pairing with your meal. You'll also find a few non-food items, like traditional herbal inhalers and the ever-popular elephant pants — ideal as a thoughtful gift or a personal touch of Thai comfort and culture in your daily life.
description.chunk5: In addition to imported goods, we offer a rotating selection of seasonal fruits and vegetables from local Dutch growers. These fresh ingredients can be easily combined with Thai staples to create flavorful fusion dishes or practical everyday meals with a Thai twist.

description.chunk1: Love cooking at home but want the real Thai experience without the hassle? Delish Thai offers freshly prepared meal kits that make Thai cooking easy, affordable, and better for the planet.
description.chunk2: Whether you're cooking for yourself, your family, or hosting friends, our kits take the guesswork out of preparing an authentic Thai meal — so you can focus on the joy of cooking and sharing good food.
description.chunk3: Each kit includes everything you need to enjoy a delicious, authentic Thai dish — without the stress or waste:
description.chunk4: • Pre-measured ingredients – No waste, no guesswork. Just the right amount for a perfectly balanced meal, every time.
description.chunk5: • Simple, step-by-step recipes – Easy to follow, whether you're a beginner or a seasoned cook. Our instructions are clear, and most meals can be prepared in under 30 minutes.
description.chunk6: All ingredients are carefully selected, and whenever possible, we use fresh herbs and sustainably sourced products. It’s our way of helping you enjoy Thai cuisine in a way that’s tasty, mindful, and fun — right from your own kitchen.
